name: Commando Mission 88
overview: Touted as being harder than the original Elite release. This version was released in Italy as Missione Commando in Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - big 100 (1987), in Special Games n.16 (settembre 1988), and in Super C64 e C128 n.21 (marzo 1988). Also released in Stonysoft #0291 / a.k.a. "Commando III". A vertically scrolling shooter created with the Shoot'em Up Construction Kit. Inspired by those films that tell the stories of reckless soldiers who go alone behind enemy lines with the task of creating confusion through destruction and killing. The hero must survive and kill as many of the enemy as possible. They are aided by the cover of rocks and other impediments while our hero has no such luxury.
